thread.title: Moto G5 and G5 Plus launching in India on March 15th
thread.title_full: Moto G5 and G5 Plus launching in India on March 15th

title: Moto G5 and G5 Plus launching in India on March 15th
text:
Moto G5 and G5 Plus launching in India on March 15th Moto G5 and G5 Plus launching in India on March 15th By February 27, 2017 “The Moto G5 duo flaunts metal unibody designs, fingerprint sensors and Android Nougat” 
Just yesterday, Lenovo introduced the latest Moto series smartphones in the form of the Moto G5 and Moto G5 Plus at its MWC event in Barcelona. Today, the company has sent out invites for a press event in India on March 15th, where the brand will be launching the Moto G5 Plus in the country. The Moto G5 is also expected to land in the country alongside the Moto G5 Plus. 
For the uninitiated, the Moto G5 and G5 Plus ( first impressions ) offer metal unibody designs, fingerprint sensors into their home buttons on the front, water-repellent nano coatings, Android Nougat and fast charging. The Moto G5 is a 5-incher, while the G5 Plus gets a bigger 5.2-inch display. The phones are expected to be priced in India below the Rs 15,000 mark. Facebook Comments
